content:
The Yehoshua Chaim Langsam Family of Hucisko, Poland


Yehoshua Chaim Langsam (18? - c.1885) was married to Feiga, daughter of Josef and Rachel Reinfeld. They lived in Hucisko, Poland and had four known children.

  • Saul married Chaya Leiba, daughter of Hirsh and Mirla (nee Wengirki) and had six known children.
    • Morris married Rose, daughter of Peretz and Frida Sena Fisch. They had one son.
      Charles
    • Harry
      (1884 - May 05, 1955) married Esther Roudman (1890 - February 28, 1966) and had four children.
      Herman, Sadie Sarah Slade, Sidney & Gertrude Heller
    • Szaje had one known daughter.
      Judy
    • David D. (1890- 1939) married Flora, daughter of Peretz and Frida Sena Fisch. They had two children.
      Perline Glantz & Sigmond
    • Elke
    • Feiga married Aron, son of Eisig and Sara (nee Raps) Feit.
      Eisig, Mirl Schmidt, Florence Fischmann, Helen Eisenberg, Sidney, Belle, Sol & Sidney
  • David (1882 - 1962) was married to Matilda "Tillie" and had one son.
    • Sidney (1909 - 2000) married Helen Grosby and had two children.
      Phyllis Adams & Joe
  • Rose (1883 - 1953) was born in Dubiecko, Poland. She married Usher Schwimmer and had six children.
    • Samuel married Jean and had two children.
      Debra & Eric
    • Anna married Max and had two children.
      Phyllis & Bernard
    • George married Mollie and had a daughter.
      Lois
    • Blanche married Chas Forman and had threee children.
      Jeffrey, Ellen Feldman & Rosanne Spear
    • Bobbie married Sam Niel and had two children.
      Richard & Susan
    • Edna married Errol Thompson and had three children.
      Arthur, boy & Karen
  • Itzik (1884 - 19?) married Dora Kornreich and had three girls.
    • girl
    • girl
    • girl




I would be very interested to hear from anyone with knowledge or an interest in the Miller family.

Moishe Miller
moishe@langsam.com

My home address is
           1374 East 28th Street
           Brooklyn NY 11210-5311
           USA

Last updated 11/5/2013
